description: Web-based platform for provisioning and interacting with Ralph agents on AWS. Gmail-style inbox as orchestration layer.

userStories.title: Sign up and sign in
userStories.description: As a user, I can sign up and sign in so I can access my workspace.
acceptanceCriteria: Sign up with email/password and GitHub OAuth via NextAuth.js
JWT session stored in HTTP-only cookie with 7-day expiry
Redirects to workspace on successful auth
Login page with email/password form and OAuth buttons
userStories.notes: Foundation story â€” must be completed first. Use NextAuth.js with MongoDB adapter.

userStories.title: Sign out
userStories.description: As a user, I can sign out so my session is closed.
acceptanceCriteria: Sign out button in user menu dropdown
Redirects to login page after sign out

userStories.title: Password reset / recovery
userStories.description: As a user, I can reset my password so I'm not blocked.
acceptanceCriteria: Email with reset token sent to registered email
New password form with validation (min 8 chars)
Success message and redirect to login
